Temperature.description: The temperature of the device at time of measurement.

Humidity.description: The humidity of the device at time of measurement.

Running.description: Shows that the device is running.

Error.description: Shows that there is an error in the device.

Count.description: The value of the internal counter.

Gyro1.description: Device orientation in the A axis.

Gyro2.description: Device orientation in the B axis.
